sense.def:
To start to do something
pomeni storiti nekaj, česar prej nismo počeli.

seg.quote: Ralph started to run.
He started laughing.
My father started work when he was ten.
Now we have to start again.
We've not made a bad start.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
start
povemo, kakšna je bila prva služba nekega človeka. Na primer, če je bila njegova prva služba, da je bil nosač, lahko rečemo:
he started as a porter
.

Kadar nekaj
starts
, se dogaja od določenega časa naprej.

seg.quote: The meeting starts at 7.
We didn't want to start a panic.
...the start of negotiations.

sense.def:
To start a business or organization
pomeni ustvariti neko podjetje ali organizacijo ali povzročiti, da nastane.

seg.quote: He scraped up the money to start a restaurant.

sense.def:
To start an engine or car
pomeni, da motor ali vozilo začne delovati.

seg.quote: They have to push it to start it.
The engine just wouldn't start.

sense.def:
To start
pomeni, da nam telo trzne, ker smo presenečeni ali preplašeni.

seg.quote: I sat down so quietly that she started.
He awakened with a start.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
for a start
napovemo prvo od večjega števila stvari, ki jih bomo povedali.

seg.quote: We can't afford this house for a start.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
start off
povemo, kakšna je bila prva služba nekega človeka. Na primer, če je bila njegova prva služba voznik taksija, lahko rečemo:
he started off as a taxi driver
.

To start off by doing something
pomeni nekaj storiti kot prvi del določene dejavnosti.

seg.quote: I started off by showing a slide of the diseased cell.

sense.def:
To start something off
pomeni povzročiti, da se nekaj začne.

seg.quote: I know what started it all off.

sense.def:
To start on something
pomeni začeti delati nekaj, kaj je treba narediti.

seg.quote: She put the forks in a neat pile and started on the knives.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
starts out as a particular thing
, je na začetku tista stvar, čeprav se pozneje spremeni.

seg.quote: These areas started out as the private lands of settlers.

sense.def:
To start out doing something
pomeni nekaj storiti na začetku določene dejavnosti.

seg.quote: You started out by saying that this was the weapon they used.

sense.def:
To start up something
pomeni nekaj ustvariti ali povzročiti, da se začne, na primer novo podjetje.

seg.quote: She wanted to start up a little country pub.

sense.def:
To start up an engine or car
pomeni poskrbeti, da motor ali vozilo začne delovati.

seg.quote: The driver started up the car.
